group_1.textCenter: I wanna get this thing sorted out as soon@as possible.
How should I go about lookin' into it...?
Well, I guess just askin' everybody would@be a good start.
If I ask around for where people heard the@rumor from...
Eventually I should wind up at the source!

group_1.narration: Oh, the Valentine's Monster rumor?@Yeah, I know about it!
Who did I first hear about it from...@Mmm... I can't quite remember...
I heard about it from lots of people.@Can't remember who told me first.

group_1.textCenter: (Man, it really seems like no one can tell@who told 'em first...)
(But I don't have any other ideas.@Gotta keep goin', slow and steady...)
Oh, that rumor? I heard it from this gal@right here!
She's been telling it to everyone.

group_1.textLeft: Really? Then where'd you first hear it?

group_1.textRight: I didn't tell anyone about it...

group_1.textCenter: Huh...? Yeah, you did! You told me.

group_1.textRight: I heard about it from a girl from the next@class over...
When I went to go tell you about it, you@said you'd already heard it all.

group_1.textCenter: Huh? No way?! You definitely got that@mixed up!

group_1.textRight: I did not! You're the one who's mixed up!
